g.text: create n connections CAi (send IDAi and RKAi)
2. send secure message with connections "public" keys (EKAi) and URIs (SUAi)
create n connections CBi (send IDBi and RKBi)
accept CAi (send EKAi-encrypted messages to CAi)
secure connections CAi with Bob's SKAi
accept CBi (send EKBi-encrypted messages to CBi)
secure connections CBi with Alice's SKBi
send "welcome" message to duplex connection (via all CAi)
send "welcome" message to duplex connection (via all CBi)
